title: Principles of Thermodynamics
description: Comprehensive study of thermodynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Principles of Materials
description: Comprehensive study of materials with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applied Materials
description: Comprehensive study of materials with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applied Controls
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in controls. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Systems
description: Advanced exploration of systems covering current research and industry practices.

title: Advanced Systems
description: In-depth analysis of systems principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Analysis
description: In-depth analysis of analysis principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Special Topics in Dynamics
description: In-depth analysis of dynamics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Senior Ethics
description: Advanced exploration of ethics covering current research and industry practices.
